metadata.title: CVE-2012-0881 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Apache Xerces2 Java Parser before 2.12.0 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted message to an XMLservice, which triggers hash table collisions.

criterions.comment: libxerces2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
